title: Make the New Tab draft match the in-Caffeine draft

requirements.text: Fix the "New Tab" draft experience so it matches the "in Caffeine" draft experience in layout, styling, and behavior (i.e., opening the app in a new browser tab should render the same UI theme, spacing, and component behavior as when viewed inside Caffeine).

quotes: fix the new tab draft to be like the in caffeine draft

acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened in a new browser tab, the UI matches the in-Caffeine draft (same theme colors, typography, spacing, and component styling).
No CSS/Tailwind/theme-related regressions occur only in the new-tab view (e.g., missing styles, different background, different layout sizing/scrolling).
Core interactions continue to work the same in the new-tab view (e.g., edit/runtime mode toggle, adding controls modal, inspector panel in edit mode, recent signals panel, import/export panel).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn components are read-only).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; introduce backend changes only if required to resolve the new-tab vs in-Caffeine mismatch.
nonGoals: Adding new product features unrelated to the new-tab draft mismatch.
Changing the radio-group behavior/orientation/logging functionality beyond what is necessary to make the new-tab draft match the in-Caffeine draft.
